string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: Meditate with ease using handpicked songs and automation, to keep you motivated and simplifying life.
Use this profile while excercising, with great songs to help you work out more efficiently.
Trouble sleeping? This profile will play soft peaceful songs to help you sleep better, when you want to
Boring Commute? Make your commute more enjoyable with great music playback.
